column2: "Ah, welcome back! What are you helping Afin ...oh, what's that? "
"Uh? For me? Thanks for everything? Everyone collected them for me?"
"...oh, um, I'm sorry. What can I say? I'm speechless, I guess."
"This is not just thanks for me. You also deserve some of this for all your help!"
"Um, but what can I say? Doesn't it feel good to have worked so hard when this kind of thing happens? Hehe!"
